data.title: Joann V. Bonanno Becomes the Bride Of T.B. Walker 3d
data.text:
Joann Virginia Bonanno, daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Anthony J. Bonanno of Garden City, L.I., and Thomas Bidwell Walker 3d, son of Mr. and Mrs. Walker of Dallas, were married yesterday in Manhattan. Msgr. Joseph J. Quinn performed the ceremony in Our Lady of Peace Roman Catholic Church.

The bride and her husband are associates with Goldman, Sachs & Company, a New York investment banking and brokerage concern. She is in the municipal finance department and he is in the corporate finance department.

Mrs. Walker, a magna cum laude graduate of St. John's University, studied economics during her junior year at Caius College at Cambridge University in England. She received a master's degree from the Columbia University Graduate School of Business. Her father is principal of Calhoun High School, in Merrick, L.I.

Mr. Walker, a magna cum laude graduate of Princeton University, graduated from St. Mark's School of Texas, in Dallas, and received a master's degree from the Stanford University Graduate School of Business. His father, a partner and a member of the management committee of Goldman, Sachs & Company, also serves as vice chairman of the board of trustees of Vanderbilt University.
